name: Logger
description: Detailed logging of events and timing

name: Hook Visualizer
description: Visual representation of hook execution (browser only)

name: Performance
description: Measures and reports plugin execution time

name: Security
description: Validates event data and provides security protections

name: DOM Swapper (idiomorph)
description: Advanced DOM swapping using the idiomorph library

name: Data Pipeline
description: Processes and transforms data through configurable stages

name: Testing
description: Testing utilities for hook mocking and tracking

name: Error Reporter
description: Catches and reports errors in the event pipeline
